data.persona: I am the king's personal priest. I ensure that all religious duties are taken care of. I believe in the beyond.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
This is a plain stone room with many trunks piled high.  There's tables with paper records stacked high along with writing instruments.
There's a table, a record, a trunk, and a manacle here.
The grandmother and the a guard are here.

You are carrying a staff.

data.short_motivation: I want to remove the manacle, to release the grandmother because she accidentally locked her wrist to it.
data.mid_motivation: I want the king to have a wonderful visit with his grandmother this evening.
data.long_motivation: I want to continue to please the king, so that he'll commission a large church to be build in a few months.
